scripts.swagger: node -e "const specs = require('./swagger'); console.log(JSON.stringify(specs, null, 2));" > swagger.json
scripts.swagger:serve: node -e "const specs = require('./swagger'); const express = require('express'); const swaggerUi = require('swagger-ui-express'); const app = express(); app.use('/api-docs', swaggerUi.serve, swaggerUi.setup(specs)); app.listen(3001, () => console.log('Swagger docs available at http://localhost:3001/api-docs'));"
